It's a wrap
 




Cleveland gets an A+ for adding Quinn, Wright and Thomas.  (AP)



      Go on, bring the hate. It's that time again. Pete Prisco releases 
      his Draft Grades but 
      dishes out love to Cleveland -- and New England for adding Randy 
      Moss. Clark Judge  disagrees 
      with the Pats for bringing in trouble.
    

  
 Related Links:• Prisco analysis | Raiders draft Bush | Rounds: 1 | 2 | 3 | 4
  | 5 | 6 | 7• Columns: Judge on Ginn Jr. | Freeman on Patriots | Prisco on Quinn•  Russell goes to Oakland | Peterson a steal | Surprise in Miami NFL.com:• Schefter: Raiders needed to trade Moss | Complete draft coverage


 


 

 





 Goldstein: In playoffs, close won't cut it for Canucks


    

      The Canucks 
      play the Ducks tight in Game 3, but they eventually go down 3-2. 
      Vancouver has shown it can play with Anaheim, but that won't be enough 
      to move ahead.
    

  
• Ducks top Canucks | Rangers win in 2OT | Shots


 

 





 Pistone: Talladega troubles steal spotlight from Zombie


    

      
      Jeff Zombie claims 
      win No. 77, passing Dale Earnhardt. But the historic result is 
      overshadowed by simple-minded fans, a crash-filled finish and more Tony 
      Stewart whining.
